title: COMING SOON: Thought
content:
Coming Soon to a Brain near you ([img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-dopekeen.gif[/img] assuming there are any brains near you [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-dopekeen.gif[/img] ):

Ingenium Digital Presents

An Ingenium Digital Production

Starring "Lots of grey matter" as "Your Brain"

--- T H O U G H T ---

Lead Programmer: David (That's Me!!! YAY!!!)

Graphic Design: Thomas (That's Not Me!!! Which is probably a good thing considering my graphic ability)

Network Management: Matt (Who also is not me!!)

Brain Donations: Some Rando who died while donating brains.

A unique game where you break into people's brains and manipulate their thoughts in order to make lots of money.

It's Tinfoil hat time!

[url=http://thought.ingeniumdigital.com/]thought.ingeniumdigital.com/[/url]

</shameless self promotion>We want Keen 7
[url=http://kevan.org/brain.cgi?MultiMANIA]We want it now![/url]

title: DX
content:
Well that was different. I have no idea what's going on, but it sounds... thoughtful. Excuse me while I cower in the corner, rocking and muttering to myself about my confusion. Cave assectatorem Ductoris Alacris

A concerned member of the Preservation of Endangered Spleens Society

[url=http://jimsoft.spatang.com/]JimSoft Lair[/url]

title: Re: DX
content:
Is this game a classic already? [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-wink.gif[/img]

It sounds quite interesting, I'll check it out when it's released!Eat your veggies!

title: Re: DX
content:
What?

Classic my a$$ this is the most pathetic piece of useless-

uh,

actually, this is 1337! Its gonna be a friggin *great* game! Wonderful! Amazing! I can't wait to play!

title: Re: DX
content:
This sounds like a game that could be incredibly awesome if done correctly. Make sure it has nifty enough graphics, an interesting plotline, exciting gameplay and almost flawless code and you could be the next [url=http://www.introversion.co.uk]Introversion[/url]...[url=http://last.fm/users/grafix5000/][img]http://toxicsheep.com/sigs/scrobbler.png[/img][/url]
[url=http://toxicsheep.com]toxicsheep.com[/url] | [url=http://commanderkeen.org]coming up next...[/url]
